meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by tritheism.
meanings.sent1: The tritheistic belief system involves the worship of three separate deities.
meanings.sent2: She follows a tritheistic faith that acknowledges three distinct gods.
meanings.sent3: In the tritheistic tale, the three gods argued over who created the sun.
meanings.sent4: The tritheistic concept of three equal divine beings is both fascinating and complex.
meanings.sent5: The tritheistic nature of the religion was evident in the intricate rituals performed.

meanings.sent1: The tritheistic priest preached about the importance of honoring three gods.
meanings.sent2: As a tritheistic individual, he actively promotes the worship of a triad of deities.
meanings.sent3: The tritheistic philosopher humorously suggested that three heads are better than one.
meanings.sent4: Her tritheistic views on divinity challenge traditional monotheistic beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The tritheistic community celebrates the unity found in the diversity of their gods.
